question: Lion tailed macaque, rhinoceros, great indian bustard, narcondam hornbill, nicobar megapode and black buck are listed in which of the following schedules of Wildlife Protection Act?
explanation: Lion tailed macaque, rhinoceros, great indian bustard, narcondam hornbill, nicobar megapode and black buck are listed in Schedule 1 of Wildlife Protection Act, 1972. They are provided with absolute protection.
